snippet: Vaccination prices have risen significantly over the past 30 years, creating dilemmas for physicians and parents and straining public health budgets.
abstract: Vaccination prices have gone from single digits to sometimes triple digits in the last two decades; situation is creating dilemmas for doctors and their patients as well as straining public health budgets; childhood immunizations are so vital to public health that Affordable Care Act mandates their coverage at no out-of-pocket cost; once a loss leader for manufacturers, vaccines now can be very profitable (Series: Paying Till It Hurts).
lead_paragraph: Vaccination prices have risen significantly over the past 30 years, creating dilemmas for physicians and parents and straining public health budgets.

headline.print_headline: The Price of Prevention: Vaccine Costs Soaring
headline.main: The Price of Prevention: Vaccine Costs Are Soaring
